name: Shadow Seekers
description: This rogue-like is a very fun game with some humor mixed in. I hope all enjoy the search through this merchant's basement for a life. It is really fun and satisfying with the generation system fully functionally after a bug fix (it stop working 2 hours till publish). Your goal is simply to collect items to improve stats. You can use a sword to stab or throw with your shadow. This is my second Ludum Dare but the other developers first. It was a great learning experience for them.  Anyways enjoy Shadow Seekers!
